moves.name: Absorb
moves.effect: Restores the user’s HP based on the amount of damage dealt to the target.

moves.name: Dire Hit +
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s critical-hit rate.

moves.name: Leaf Storm
moves.effect: Sharply lowers the user’s Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Trust in Nature!
moves.effect: Increases the user’s move gauge by two. Converts the user’s stat reductions into stat increases.

passives.name: Speeding Sun 2
passives.description: Quickly charges the move gauge when the weather is sunny.
